com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client.bootstrap
Class Bootstrap

java.lang.Object
  com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      com.rhizospherejs.gwt.client.bootstrap.Bootstrap

public class Bootstrap
extends com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject

Bootstrap is responsible for initialization and deployment of a Rhizosphere visualization. It wraps the native rhizo.bootstrap.Bootstrap javascript object.

Initialization of a Rhizosphere visualization is divided in two steps: during the prepare phase the visualization chrome and all the other static elements are set up and rendered. During the deploy phase the actual contents (the visualization models) are rendered and displayed, an initial layout is chosen and filters are initialized.

This class is for internal use. External users of the Rhizosphere visualization should rely on Rhizosphere which hides all these details.

Author:
battlehorse@google.com (Riccardo Govoni)

Method Detail

create

public static Bootstrap create(com.google.gwt.dom.client.Element container,
                               RhizosphereOptions<?> options,
                               HasReadyHandlers readyHandler)
Creates a new Bootstrap instance to initialize and deploy a Rhizosphere visualization.

Parameters:
container - The HTML element that will contain the visualization.
options - Visualization configuration options.
readyHandler - A handler to notify once the visualization is ready for user interaction.
Returns:
A new Bootsrap instance.

prepare

public final <T> RhizosphereUserAgent<T> prepare()
Prepares the visualization container for subsequent deployment.

Returns:
A userAgent that can be subsequently used to programmatically drive the visualization.

deployExplicit

public final void deployExplicit(java.util.Collection<com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject> models,
                                 RhizosphereMetaModel metamodel,
                                 NativeRenderer<?> renderer)
Deploys a Rhizosphere visualization.

Parameters:
models - The set of models that the visualization will display.
metamodel - The visualization metamodel.
renderer - The visualization renderer.

isDeployed

public final boolean isDeployed()
Returns whether the Rhizosphere visualization managed by this bootstrapper has been deployed yet (models are visible to users) or it has only been prepared (only the visualization chrome has been rendered).
